title: The Spider's Web
description: The Spider's Web entertains readers as they learn about how spiders build and use webs. No matter how students feel about spiders, the amazing photographs of a spider building a web and feeding will hold their attention. Use this fascinating book to teach summarizing information and sequencing events.
